alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 9:27PM CDT until April 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Concordia, Adams and Wilkinson Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, APRIL 11... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, April 11. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 46.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning to a crest of 48.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 46.1 Mon 2 pm CDT 47.2 47.7 48.2 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 930 AM CDT.
